value:
In a way, this outfit is sobering.
I feel motivated to confront
the new year with purpose.

It's much warmer here than in
Nifl. Here, I suspect we won't be
snowed in during the new year.

If I can protect just one person from
a sad fate this year, well...that's my
New Year's wish come true.

I've just eaten some sort of soft
and white delicacy for the first
time. It was called...mochi?

It's exhilarating to dash through
the icy New Year's air. It may be
chilly, but it warms the heart.

I have New Year's tidings for you
from $Nf.
I wish you good health this year.

That was better than I expected!
Perhaps this is a year for change.

Not bad... My luck seems to be
improving.

To not be ready to face the
challenges of the new year...
I must gird myself.

The year is still young, yet I've
already found myself in your debt.

My name is Hríd. As the new
year rises, let us celebrate
the sunset of the last.

Nifl's winters are long and
arduous. They fiercely test the will
and the strength of our people.$k$pDespite knowing this, we stay,
and every year we brace ourselves
until winter gives way to spring.$k$pFor us, the new year is the halfway
mark between winter and spring.
It signals our coming salvation.$k$pI'd like to assist you in reaching
your own spring this year,
$Nu.$k$pThis year, I will be at your
side with my sword to
repay the debt I owe you.
せいっ！
そこだ
うああっ！
さすがだな…
To the new year!
Time to celebrate!
Starting with a swing!
Let's hope for a good year.
I wanted to do so much more...
Hmm...
Thanks to your efforts, Nifl has been saved.
Perhaps this can be a celebration of our success!
Peace is a wonderful thing... But without strength, peace cannot be sustained.
This realm is quite different from either Nifl or Múspell.
Do me a favor and tell me if I've got this thing on wrong, will you? If I do, I must fix it immediately.
Do you think these clothes suit me? You do? How can you tell?
I will never forget the debt I owe you. By staying at your side, I may repay it.
Understood.
A new year.
I will repay you.
